definition: season/the last month of a season/fourth or youngest amongst brothers/classifier for seasonal crop yields

sentences.english: The flood forecasting division gives authorities 24-hour warning of monsoon flooding.
sentences.chinese: 洪水预报部门为当局提供了24小时季风洪水预警。

sentences.english: Their variations in increase and decrease are closely related to the monsoons of South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 这些变性水团的消长变化与南海的季风密切相关。

sentences.english: Every year, an action plan is prepared ahead of monsoon season.
sentences.chinese: 每年赶在季风季节前，苏拉特已作好行动计划。

sentences.english: The result was further chaos on roads clogged by rubble and monsoon rains.
sentences.chinese: 结果由于瓦砾阻塞道路，季风带来暴雨，混乱加剧。

sentences.english: The summer monsoon of East Asia and monsoon mode also has obvious interdecadal changes.
sentences.chinese: 东亚夏季风和季风模态还存在明显的年代际变化。

sentences.english: Biomass of tropical montane rain forest in Xishuangbanna of Southwest China;
sentences.chinese: 山地雨林是热带北缘季风气候的地带性森林类型。

sentences.english: For " rare some is mutiple level on the world monsoon sex is semi-tropical primitive rain forest ".
sentences.chinese: 为“世界上稀有的多层次季风性亚热带原始雨林”。

sentences.english: The arrival of the monsoon awakens one of the forest's most extraordinary moisture-loving inhabitants.
sentences.chinese: 季风的来临唤醒了森林中最喜好潮湿的居民。

sentences.english: This implies that increased precipitation from a strong summer monsoon triggered glacier advances in the Himalaya during interglacial times.
sentences.chinese: 因此，这一区域的高山冰川回应夏天季风强度的变化。

sentences.english: Normaly, the skies are clear during the north east monsoon.
sentences.chinese: 通常，再东北季风控制下晴空万里。
它是亚热带温润季风气候。

sentences.english: Thelow-frequency barotropic kinetic energy in the Asian monsoon area is smaller.
sentences.chinese: 亚洲季风区低频正压动能较小。

sentences.english: The climate of Changbaishan is Alpine Climate of monsoon types in the temperate zonal continent.
sentences.chinese: 长白山是温带大陆季风型高山气候。

sentences.english: The Hunshandake sand land located in the warm temperate zone which is continental monsoon climate area.
sentences.chinese: 浑善达克沙地属中温带半干旱大陆性季风气候区。

sentences.english: Each area has its own dramatic pratfalls, such as monsoons, violent storms and drought.
sentences.chinese: 每个区域都有其独特的麻烦，如季风，暴风雨和干旱。

sentences.english: In addition, the problem of Plateau monsoon is discussed, too.
sentences.chinese: 另外，也讨论了高原季风的问题。

definition: cold air current/cold ocean current/cold stream
sea breeze/sea wind (i.e. from the sea)
El Niño, equatorial climate variation in the Pacific
